text: Banff is a town within Banff National Park in Alberta, Canada. It is located in Alberta's Rockies along the Trans-Canada Highway, approximately west of Calgary and east of Lake Louise. At above Banff is the community with the second highest elevation in Alberta, after Lake Louise. == Notable people == * Karen Percy, double-bronze medal skier at the 1988 Winter Olympics * J. Jill Robinson, award-winning author of fiction and creative nonfiction * Kevin Smyth, former NHL player * Ryan Smyth, former NHL player == References == == Other websites == Category:Towns in Alberta
title: Banff, Alberta
